content.stregaflora.nachthex.blurb: He found you out. That little fucking rat. After your execution, you were buried in Graven-Tosk. But They found you. They dug you up and invited you their coven and taught you of His gifts. Your deathmarks will never heal again. But you can get revenge. Murder the rat. Murder them all.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.burning.des: Burning. Your flesh is hot as bluefire.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.drowning.de: Drowning. You cannot drink water, and instead must drink liquor.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.hanging.des: Hanging. Your neck is crooked and broken.
Slit throat. Blood permanently gushes out of this open wound.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.crushed.des: Crushed. You body is flattened to a sheet.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.stoned.desc: Stoned. You entire body is blue from bruises.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.tableDescri: A spell can be cast once every moon. All spells are cast using Presence.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.puppeteerin: Take over an NPC or monster.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.danceMagick: Curse a person through dance. All damage done to them is doubled for d20 minutes.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.bloodMagick: Any blood spilled will burn eternally.
Bring back any dead being for d20+Presence minutes.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.shapeshifti: Turn into any animal for d10+Presence minutes.
content.stregaflora.nachthex.futureTelli: Ask the GM a yes/no question. They must answer truthfully.
